ygData.subject: The Energonians look for friends

Subject: The Energonians look for friends
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 126

    "How is the energon supply?" Demanded Subcommander Putnam. He held an 
inventory list and looked at Odiphious, the one who was responsible for the 
upkeep of the energon.
    He replied, "We have met the week's quota. Why? We have enough energy." 
HE asked, not knowing what Ominous was up too.
    Putname smiled. "The Commander has something planned for all of it. 
Something big. I dont know what it is, but whoever its for is going to be 
sorry."

    Ominous was on level one, better known as the Facility. In this level of 
the Orb were the many labs for Liquid Energon. Also, all the mining deposits 
ended up in the holding tanks on this level.
    "Akron, get ready, the Fuz is powerful." He said. They were in the middle 
of the Liquid Energon process. Fuzzing it into Liquid was dangerous, and a 
back lash occasionally happened.
    As the energon slowly melted from the radiation, it released a fantastic 
blue fume. It was a beautiful glow, almost heavenly. And the thing Ominous 
wanted more than ever. It was the very unstable Energon gas. Unfortunetly, it 
dissolved within minutes. He couldnt figure out how to keep it from fadding 
away.
    "So, what are you planning to do with all this energon boss?" She asked, 
through pink optics.
    Ominous gave a sinister smile, but then agian, all of his smiles were 
sinister. "I have a plan. ALl will be reveiled soon Akron. But, You and I 
need to go and have a talk with an old associate of mine."
    Akron looked forward to getting out of the Orb. "And who would that be?" 
    Ominous paused. The name of this person was a powerful one, one that held 
much respect, and fear, around here. "Allience Commander Zardus. He's our 
ticket to domination."
    "I thought you wanted to destroy all Transformers!" She said, a tone of 
anger in her sweet voice. "Why would we make a pact with them?"
    Ominous, "Because Akron, the Allience is powerful, very much so. With 
thier help we could do some major killing. And then of course we would 
convert them into Energonians."
    She still didnt like the idea, but nodded like a good soldier.
    "Besides, with what Im cooking up, I doubt any non-Energonian would 
survive. He, and his minions, wont have much or a choice."

    They departed the Orb, and Madagascar completely. Headed towrds the 
Allience HQ in a simple two person transport. Ominous was never one for 
walking, and now that he had his very own Energonian Vessle, with all sorts 
of toys, he was going to use them.
    Tapping the communication panle, he spoke. "Zardus, or any ranking 
Allience Member, this is Commander Ominous Prime of the Energonian Empire. I 
wish to hold an audience with Zardus. I am an hours journey from your 
location. Please respond soon."
    "Do you think they will listen to what we have to say?" Akron asked from 
the seat directly behinde him in the small cockpit.
    Ominous turned his silver head a bit, "They'll listen. I know Zardus, and 
he knows when an oppertunity comes his way. We wont be turned away."
    The small transport sped onward, over the blue ocean with white capped 
waves and the occasional dolphin leaping up to greet them.
